rules_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Hidden Garden Entrance: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Monument {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: When Cosmic Contraption enters or leaves the battlefield, you may reveal a noncreature card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.
flavor_text2:
[i]“The most mundane places hold the most exciting trinkets.”
—Marilye, the Thieving Blade[/i]
